forces.fx: cos(t) * sin(x) * sin(y) * sin(z)     - 3 * sin(t) * sin(x) * sin(y) * cos(z)  + sin(t) /6 * sin(x)*sin(x)*  sin(y)*sin(y)  *sin(z)*sin(z)
forces.fy: cos(t) * cos(x) * cos(y) * cos(z)      - 3 * sin(t) * cos(x) * cos(y) * sin(z) + sin(t) /6 * sin(x)*cos(x) * sin(y)*cos(y)  *sin(z)*cos(z)
forces.fz: cos(t) * cos(x) * sin(y) * (sin(z) + cos(z))  - 3 * cos(x) * sin(y) * (cos(z) + sin(z))   + sin(t) /6 * sin(x)*cos(x)*  sin(y)*sin(y)  *sin(z)*(sin(z) + cos(z))
